Location.Description: Groups of small tables with four chairs, as well as a much larger one with twenty dominate the room. Each is covered with a thick tablecloth reaching down to the ground. Many meals have been enjoyed here over the years by members of the sorority - though given the contents of the sister's kitchen, you suspect most of those consumed most recently were delivery pizza. While none of the sisters are eating here now, you could swear you see the cloth of the largest table moving from time to time, faint moans issuing from beneath it...
